summary: A true HDR and realistic ENB. Insane graphical overhaul that looks amazing. For ELFX and NLA. Using resources from very popular ENBs to create a crisp stunning image.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana]


Requirements:[/font]
[font=Times New Roman]﻿You will need ELFX if you want interiors to look most natural and realistic. NLA is a required weather .esp you will also need in order to experience outdoors as in my screenshots. [/font]

[font=Verdana]Instructions:[/font]
[font=Times New Roman]-Place NLA.esp in your data folder of skyrim (it is located where you installed skyrim and is under Steam>steamapps>common>skyrim>data (PLACE ESP HERE)
[color=#ff0000]DO NOT FORGET TO ACTIVATE IT.[/color]

-Download the latest ENB files, go to wrapper version when you open the archive, copy and paste D3d11 and enbhost to your skyrim     directory Steam>steamapps>common>skyrim (PLACE HERE)

http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html     [color=#ff0000][i][u]Something seems to be wrong with the website as of 7/15/18[/u][/i][/color]

-Download my crap
-Copy all files and paste in Skyrim Directory Steam>steamapps>common>skyrim (PLACE HERE)

DONE

[/font][color=#ffff00][font=Verdana]Things that need to be done:
[/font][/color][font=Times New Roman][color=#00ffff]-If anyone knows how please reply, I need to configure lighting for certain weathers to match a more realistic weather system.
-Get rain effects to work on the screen [/color][/font]
author: Skylanator
